cards.title: At least 15 people killed after funicular railway in Lisbon derails
cards.summary: At least 15 people killed after Lisbon's Gloria funicular railway car derailed. At least 18 people, including a child, were injured, five of them seriously. Authorities said some foreign nationals were among the dead but would not identify the victims or disclose their nationalities.

cards.title: Hot mic catches Xi and Putin discussing organ transplants and immortality
cards.summary: Hot mic catches Xi and Putin discussing organ transplants and immortality. Putin suggested even eternal life could be achievable as a result of innovations in biotechnology. The unguarded moment was captured on a livestream carried by Chinese state TV as the two leaders walked together through China's historic Tiananmen Square.

cards.title: Epstein accusers say they are compiling list of his associates
cards.summary: Nine female Epstein accusers spoke at a Capitol rally on Wednesday. They say they are compiling a list of Epstein associates who they say were involved in abuse. The event was organised by US lawmakers who are calling for more files to be released.
